extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createUser()
      This method sends a POST Request to the server and creates a User in the database.
      void getCountryLeaderboard(java.lang.String country)
      This method sends a GET Request to the server and retrieves the 'Local' leaderboard according to the specified country.
      void getLeaderboard()
      This method sends a GET Request to the server and retrieves the 'Global' leaderboard from the server.
      void getProfile()
      This method sends a GET Request to the server and retrieves the profile of the user.
      User getUser()
      This method @return's the User.
      void printLeaderboard(java.lang.String body)
      This method prints the leaderboard data with specified limit.
      java.lang.String recieve(boolean check)
      This method recieved the response from the server and @return's it.
      void setUser(User u)
      This method sets the User.
      void startConnection()
      This method starts a connection with the server.
      void stop()
      This method closes the connection to the server.
      void updateScore(int points)
      This method sends a POST Request to the server and updates the points of the User by desired points.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Client

        public Client(java.lang.String serverAddress,
              int port,
              int limit)
        Parameters:
        serverAddress - is public IPv4 address of the server.
        port - is the port number.
        limit - is the number of users to be displayed on the leaderboard.

        This method starts a connection with the server.

      • getCountryLeaderboard

        public void getCountryLeaderboard(java.lang.String country)
        This method sends a GET Request to the server and retrieves the 'Local' leaderboard according to the specified country.
        Parameters:
        country - is the ISO code.

      • getProfile

        public void getProfile()
        This method sends a GET Request to the server and retrieves the profile of the user.

      • updateScore

        public void updateScore(int points)
        This method sends a POST Request to the server and updates the points of the User by desired points.
        Parameters:
        points - is the new point to be updated.

      • createUser

        public void createUser()
        This method sends a POST Request to the server and creates a User in the database.

      • recieve

        public java.lang.String recieve(boolean check)
        This method recieved the response from the server and @return's it.
        Parameters:
        check - is the boolean value to determine if response will be contaion a User data.
        Returns:
        the response from the server.

      • printLeaderboard

        public void printLeaderboard(java.lang.String body)
        This method prints the leaderboard data with specified limit.
        Parameters:
        body - is the body of the HTTP Response.
